benchmark_details.name: Four Shades of Life Sciences (FSoLS)
benchmark_details.overview: The Four Shades of Life Sciences dataset contains 2,603 texts on 14 life-science topics, classified into four categories of life science publications. The dataset aims to support the detection of disinformation in health and life sciences by providing a diverse range of texts from multiple sources.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive dataset that aids in the automated detection of disinformation in life sciences literature.

data.source: The dataset includes texts retrieved from various sources including scientific journals, health websites, and disinformation websites.
data.annotation: Manually curated and classified into four categories of life science publications.

methodology.calculation: F1 Score is calculated using standard methods in the context of multi-label classification with 4 labels.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 Scores indicate better classification performance across different classes of texts.
methodology.validation: Cross-validation was utilized to ensure the reliability of the model predictions.
